Directions: In a large soup kettle, combine water, carrots, onion and celery. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 20 minutes or until the vegetables are tender. Add broccoli, cauliflower, garlic, bouillon, picante sauce and seasonings. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes or until broccoli and cauliflower are tender. Add chicken and noodles. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes or until heated through.
Ingredients: 3 1/2 cups egg noodles, cooked and drained
